objects.specification: A square flat floor panel forming the base of the booth, with a smooth matte finish. The surface spans exactly six meters by six meters, providing a stable and even platform. The color is a soft neutral light gray to complement all interior elements.

A tall flat back wall rising three meters high and spanning six meters wide, with a uniform smooth surface. The finish is a crisp white paint that provides a clean backdrop for graphics or branding. The edges are square and the wall is structurally reinforced at the top and bottom.
A side wall of three meters height running six meters deep, with a smooth white painted finish matching the back wall. It is constructed with lightweight composite panels and has clean, sharp edges.
A side wall identical to the left wall in dimensions and finish, three meters tall and six meters deep, with a seamless painted surface and sturdy frame.

A rectangular reception counter with a bright glossy finish in a vivid RGB tone. It measures one point five meters wide, one meter tall, and half a meter deep. The front panel is slightly curved, and the countertop has a polished surface ideal for interaction.

A tall rectangular display shelf standing two meters high and one meter wide, with a neutral matte finish. It features four evenly spaced shelves with slim metal supports and a light wood grain look. The back panel is closed for a clean appearance.

A tall rectangular display shelf standing two meters high and one meter wide, with a neutral matte finish. It features four evenly spaced shelves with slim metal supports and a light wood grain look. The back panel is closed for a clean appearance.

A square interactive display table one meter by one meter with waist‐height at eighty centimeters. The tabletop is brightly colored with a glossy finish, and the legs are slim metal. The edges are gently rounded for safety.

A square interactive display table one meter by one meter with waist‐height at eighty centimeters. The tabletop is brightly colored with a glossy finish, and the legs are slim metal. The edges are gently rounded for safety.

A square interactive display table one meter by one meter with waist‐height at eighty centimeters. The tabletop is brightly colored with a glossy finish, and the legs are slim metal. The edges are gently rounded for safety.

A square interactive display table one meter by one meter with waist‐height at eighty centimeters. The tabletop is brightly colored with a glossy finish, and the legs are slim metal. The edges are gently rounded for safety.

A vibrant rectangular banner two meters wide and one meter tall, with bright saturated colors and bold graphics. It hangs from the top edge of the back wall and is printed on lightweight fabric with reinforced grommets.

A vibrant rectangular banner two meters wide and one meter tall, with bright saturated colors and bold graphics. It hangs from the top edge of the back wall and is printed on lightweight fabric with reinforced grommets.
Group container for the seating area, holding round tables and chairs arranged for visitor discussion.

A small round table with a smooth tabletop made of light-colored laminate, diameter eighty centimeters and height seventy‐five centimeters. The pedestal base is metal painted matte black for stability and modern style.
A simple visitor chair with a curved backrest and seat cushion, upholstered in a durable fabric. The frame is slim metal with a matte finish, and the seat height is suitable for tabletop seating.
A simple visitor chair with a curved backrest and seat cushion, upholstered in a durable fabric. The frame is slim metal with a matte finish, and the seat height is suitable for tabletop seating.

A decorative potted plant with a cylindrical pot in a matte green finish and a cluster of rounded leaf shapes above. The foliage is composed of stylized green spheres and cylinders for a modern look.

A hanging pendant light with a conical shade painted matte black. It emits a warm white illumination and is suspended by a thin cable from the booth ceiling structure.
